title: Chair, "Aeron", 1992
medium: Die-cast glass-reinforced polyester, aluminum, Hytrel polymer, polyesther, Lycra
creditline: Gift of the employee-owners of Herman Miller, Inc.
description: Task chair of black mesh stretch fabric within black frame consisting of contoured back, broad contoured seat with sloping front edge, adjustment mechanism under seat; black, adjustable padded arm supports; base consisting of vertical post on five radiating feet with casters.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chair, "Aeron", 1992.
1992. Die-cast glass-reinforced polyester, aluminum, Hytrel polymer, polyesther, Lycra. Gift of the employee-owners of Herman Miller, Inc.. 1997-73-1.
